document_data.name: Vevette Blackwater
document_data.mainbody: '''Vevette Blackwater''' ({{Pronounce|veh|VET|refs=}}) was a high-ranking member of [[Manshoon]]'s [[Zhentarim]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Vevette resided inside [[Kolat Tower]] with her master Manshoon.
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} if [[Manshoon]] managed to obtain the ''[[Stone of Golorr]]'', after the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] and some adventurers discovered the ''Stone'''s hiding place devised by the [[dragonborn]] butcher [[Thrakkus]], Vevette was instructed to deliver the ''Stone'' to the fellow [[Zhent]] [[Agorn Fuoco]] and she managed to deliver it during a performance at the [[Trades Ward of Waterdeep|Trades Ward]] theater called the [[Brizzenbright]].
document_data.Relationship: Vevette was one of the lieutenants of Manshoon.
